description: Vulkan 1.3.300 debuted on Friday with a handful of fixes and one new extension...
title: Vulkan 1.3.300 Delivers New Cooperative Matrix Extension From NVIDIA

description: With Linux 6.13 there is going to be the initial kernel graphics driver support for Xe3 in integrated form to be found with next-gen Panther Lake processors. Merged today for Mesa 24.3 this quarter is the initial OpenGL and Vulkan driver enablement for Xe3 graphics...
title: Initial Intel Xe3 OpenGL & Vulkan Driver Code Submitted For Mesa 24.3

description: Submitted today were a set of x86 platform driver fixes for merging ahead of the Linux 6.12-rc5 release due out on Sunday. For the most part mostly mundane fixes. But notable is an ASUS WMI fix to address the Core Ultra 200V "Lunar Lake" performance issue I've pointed out now in several articles...
title: ASUS WMI Fix Submitted For Linux 6.12-rc5 To Handle Lunar Lake Performance Issue

description: Following the recent concerns over Bitwarden potentially moving further away from open-source given SDK changes that appeared, Bitwarden has now further addressed the situation to ease the community concerns...
title: Bitwarden Makes Change To Address Recent Open-Source Concerns

description: KDE developers continue being very busy prepping more bug fixes for the Plasma 6.2.x series while continuing to work on new feature material for Plasma 6.3...
title: KDE Fixing Many Bugs, Prepping New Plasma 6.3 Features
